**Table for with sensors**



```{r}


Tws = data.frame( duration =        c(1,7,14,21,28,35,42,49,56,63,70,77,84),
                  with_sensor =  c(0.05, 2.711, 5.058, 7.158, 8.890, 10.622, 12.264, 13.816, 15.278,16.651,17.933, 19.126, 20.229),
                  energy_duration = c(24.10, 41.67, 45.59, 48.66, 52.18, 54.29,56.02, 57.54, 58.91, 60.20, 61.42, 62.59, 63.73))

Tws


y=c(1,7,14,21,28,35,42,49,56,63,70,77,84)
x=c(0.05, 2.711, 5.058, 7.158, 8.890, 10.622,                                          12.264, 13.816, 15.278,16.651,17.933, 19.126,                                      20.229)
z=c(24.10, 41.67, 45.59, 48.66, 52.18, 54.29,                                           56.02, 57.54, 58.91, 60.20, 61.42, 62.59,                                           63.73)


plot(x~y,
     main = "Energy Consumption WITH Sensors",
     xlab= "Duration (Hours)",
     ylab = "Electrical Power (kWh)",
     cex= 1,
     ylim = c(0, 60),
     col = "red",
     pch=21,  
     bg="red")

lines(x~y,
     bg="red")

line=lm(x~y)
abline(line, col="blue")


```
